hero.title: The Ultimate Presentation of Architectural Model Art
hero.subtitle: Professional 3D Modeling · Craftsmanship · Digital Creativity

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Dream Space was founded in 2010, specializing in architectural model design, production, and visual art digital display research and application. We are committed to transforming designers' creative ideas into exquisite physical models, providing comprehensive model making solutions for clients.
about.mission-text: Through exquisite craftsmanship and innovative technology, we transform abstract design concepts into tangible physical models, providing intuitive and accurate visual presentations for architectural design, real estate exhibitions, urban planning, and other fields.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: We provide comprehensive architectural model making services, from concept design to finished product display, meeting the diverse needs of different clients.
services.building-model-desc: Transforming designers' intentions into concrete physical objects through miniature实体方式, allowing clients to more intuitively understand designers' intentions and ideas, achieving marketing and display effects.
services.digital-sandbox-desc: Through the integration of sound, light, electricity, images, 3D animation, computer programming technology and physical models, visitors can feel as if they are on the scene with strong interactivity and better experience.
services.vr-ar-desc: Combining virtual reality and augmented reality technologies to provide customers with immersive interactive experiences, making architectural design solutions more vivid and intuitive.
services.exhibition-design-desc: In-depth research on your needs to output overall solutions, using design software to draw in proportion and combine with multimedia technology to show you a clear layout of the exhibition hall.
services.digital-multimedia-desc: Combining images, text, audio, video, etc., to provide you with corporate promotional videos, 3D animations, digital exhibition hall multimedia design, production, and shooting services.
services.ai-model-preview-desc: Using artificial intelligence technology to automatically convert 2D drawings into 3D model previews, allowing customers to view effects in real-time and experience architectural space in advance.

process.title: Production Process
process.subtitle: We have a standardized production process to ensure that each project is completed with high quality and efficiency.
process.step1-desc: In-depth understanding of customer needs, clarification of key elements such as project objectives, uses, proportions, materials, and provision of professional advice.
process.step2-desc: Formulate detailed production plans based on needs, including design drawings, material lists, process flows, and time planning.
process.step3-desc: Precise production according to the design plan, including material cutting, carving, assembly, painting and other links to ensure accuracy and quality.
process.step4-desc: Comprehensive inspection of the completed model to ensure that dimensional accuracy, appearance effects, and structural stability meet requirements.
process.step5-desc: Safely deliver the completed model to the customer's designated location and provide professional installation and commissioning services to ensure the best display效果.

projects.title: Project Cases
projects.subtitle: We have successfully completed numerous architectural model projects covering real estate, urban planning, commercial complexes and other fields.
projects.coastal-city-desc: 1:100 scale, made of acrylic and ABS materials, equipped with lighting system, showing the overall planning and architectural details of the real estate.
projects.smart-city-desc: 1:5000 scale, combined with digital sandbox technology, showing urban transportation, greening, water system and other planning layouts, supporting interactive demonstrations.
projects.cbd-desc: 1:200 scale, finely made commercial complexes, office buildings, hotels and other buildings, showing the bustling scene of the urban commercial center.
projects.mountain-villas-desc: 1:150 scale, combined with natural terrain, finely made villa groups and garden landscapes, showing the elegant environment of high-end residential areas.
projects.eco-city-desc: 1:2000 scale, highlighting the concept of ecological environmental protection, showing urban green space systems, ecological water systems and low-carbon transportation networks.
projects.cultural-park: Cultural and Creative Industrial Park Model
projects.cultural-park-desc: 1:100 scale, integrating modern and traditional architectural styles, showing the vitality and creative atmosphere of the cultural and creative industries.

model-preview.title: 3D Model Preview
model-preview.subtitle: Through interactive 3D model preview, fully understand our production technology and detail processing.

team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: We have an experienced and skilled professional team dedicated to providing customers with the highest quality services.
team.zhang-ming-desc: 15 years of experience in architectural model design, has led many large-scale projects, and is good at integrating innovative concepts into model making.
team.li-qiang-desc: 12 years of model making experience, proficient in various model materials and production processes, responsible for technological innovation and quality control.
team.wang-fang-desc: 8 years of architectural design experience, good at converting 2D drawings into 3D models, focusing on detail performance and visual effects.
team.zhao-wei-desc: 6 years of digital technology experience, focusing on VR/AR technology applications and digital sandbox development, promoting the integration of traditional models and digital technologies.

testimonials.title: Customer Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: Listen to what our customers have to say, their satisfaction is our greatest affirmation.
testimonials.testimonial1: The architectural models produced by Dream Space are very exquisite with perfect detail processing, perfectly showing our design concepts. Their team is professional and efficient, and they are trustworthy partners.
testimonials.testimonial2: We have cooperated with Dream Space for many years. The sales models they produced have helped us improve our sales performance, and customer feedback is very good. Their service is thoughtful and delivery is timely, worthy of recommendation.
testimonials.testimonial3: Dream Space's digital sandbox technology is very advanced, which has provided great help for our urban planning display. Their team has strong technical strength and can quickly respond to changes in our needs.
testimonials.lin-company: A large real estate development company
testimonials.wang-company: An urban planning and design institute

upload.title: Upload Files
upload.subtitle: Upload your project materials, and we will provide you with professional model making solutions.
upload.project-description-placeholder: Please describe your project requirements, special requirements, etc. in detail
upload.contact-phone-placeholder: Please enter your contact phone number
upload.file-upload-desc: Supports uploading CAD drawings, renderings, reference pictures and other files, with a single file size not exceeding 50MB.
upload.upload-files-area: Click or drag files to upload here

progress.title: Project Progress Tracking
progress.subtitle: Real-time view of your project progress, and keep abreast of the latest status of model production.

ai-preview.title: AI Intelligent Model Preview
ai-preview.subtitle: Upload 2D drawings, AI technology will automatically generate 3D model previews for you to experience architectural space effects in advance.
ai-preview.intelligent-recognition-desc: AI automatically recognizes walls, doors, windows, stairs and other elements in 2D drawings and accurately converts them into 3D models.
ai-preview.material-rendering-desc: Automatically match suitable materials and textures to provide realistic visual effect previews.
ai-preview.fast-generation-desc: Completion of 2D to 3D conversion in a few minutes, greatly shortening the pre-design cycle.
ai-preview.real-time-adjustment-desc: Support online adjustment of model parameters, such as color, material, lighting, etc., and view effect changes in real-time.
